00008 Message::Message(int size)
00009 {
00010   realBuffer = NULL;
00011   buffer = NULL;
00012   len = 0;
00013   origine = UnknownOrigine;
00014   OriginalSize = size;
00015
00016   if ( OriginalSize > 0 )
00017   {
00018     realBuffer = new OMISCID_TLM char[size+1];
00019     buffer = realBuffer+1;
00020
00021   }
00022 }

00061 SimpleString Message::ToString(unsigned int MaxBufferLenToWrite /* default = 20, min value = 0 max value is 256 */) const
00062 {
00063     TemporaryMemoryBuffer TmpBuffer(300);
00064
00065     SimpleString TmpMessage = "Message ";
00066     TmpMessage   += mid;
00067     TmpMessage   += " (";
00068
00069     if ( len < 1024 )   // less that 1 KB
00070     {
00071         TmpMessage += len;
00072         TmpMessage += "bytes)";
00073     }
00074     else if ( len >= 1024 && len < (1024*1024) ) // from 1KB to 1Mo
00075     {
00076         // compute size in ko
00077         *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00078         snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), "%.2f Kbytes)", ((float)len)/1024.f );
00079         TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00080     }
00081     else        // over 1 Mo
00082     {
00083         // compute size in ko
00084         *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00085         snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), "%.2f Mbytes)", ((float)len)/(1024.0f*1024.0f) );
00086         TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00087     }
00088
00089     if ( origine == FromUDP )
00090     {
00091         TmpMessage += " on UDP from ";
00092     }
00093     else
00094     {
00095         TmpMessage += " on TCP from ";
00096     }
00097
00098     TmpMessage += ComTools::PeerIdAsString(pid);
00099
00100     if ( MaxBufferLenToWrite == 0 || MaxBufferLenToWrite > 256 )
00101     {
00102         TmpMessage += "\n";
00103     }
00104     else
00105     {
00106         SimpleString Format = ":\n%";
00107         Format += MaxBufferLenToWrite;
00108         Format += ".";
00109         Format += MaxBufferLenToWrite;
00110         Format += "s\n";
00111         *((char*)TmpBuffer) = '\0';     // Empty string
00112         snprintf( (char*)TmpBuffer, TmpBuffer.GetLength(), (const char*)Format.GetStr(), buffer );
00113         TmpMessage += (char*)TmpBuffer;
00114     }
00115
00116     return TmpMessage;
00117 }
